Package com.ftc11392.sequoia.task

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConditionalTask
    A Task that schedules a Task based on the value a boolean.
    DefaultTask
    Usually the default Task in a Subsystem that does not have its own default behavior.
    InstantScheduleTask
    Schedules the given Tasks (Task).
    InstantTask
    A Task that will only initialize, running the given Runnable.
    ParallelDeadlineBundle
    A TaskBundle of a deadline Task and other tasks.
    ParallelRaceBundle
    A TaskBundle that runs a bundle of tasks (Task) in parallel.
    ParallelTaskBundle
    A TaskBundle that runs tasks (Task) in parallel.
    PerpetualTask
    A Task that prevents its given Task from stopping itself, only allowing it to be interrupted.
    PIDFTask
    A Task that controls a Subsystem using a PIDFController.
    RunTask
    A Task that runs a Runnable until interrupted.
    Scheduler  
    ScheduleTask
    A Task that schedules the given tasks on initialization.
    SequentialTaskBundle
    A Task that schedules the given tasks in sequence.
    StartEndTask
    A Task that runs a Runnable once when it is initialized and another Runnable once when it is interrupted.
    SwitchTask
    A Task that, given a selection of tasks, runs one of the tasks based on the given selector.
    Task  
    TaskBundle  
    WaitTask
    A Task that does nothing but stop running after a given amount of time.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TaskException
    Exceptions related to tasks.
